title: Construction of a Building Block - C for the Faculty of Management Studies and Commerce,  University of Jaffna
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to award the contract for the above construction, for a total cost of Rs.67,286,354.29 as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
